trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> property to determine which cell changed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> propriedade para determinar qual célula é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which cell state changed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> propriedade para determinar qual estado da célula é alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that has a changed state.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values indicating the state that has changed on the cell.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs" /> class.

This method uses the parameter values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa os valores de parâmetro para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that has a changed state.
The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state that has changed on the cell.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values indicating the state that has changed on the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> que indica o estado que foi alterado na célula.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.
